headline: China Stockpiling Nuclear Weapons At An Alarming Rate: Report
author: Philip Lenczycki
sentences: China is racing to stockpile nuclear weapons capable of striking North America, The Wall Street Journal reported Saturday.The communist nation is reportedly “accelerating” the development of “more than 100 suspected missile silos,” each reportedly able to house missiles with nuclear tips that have the ability to reach American shores, according to the WSJ report, which cited anonymous sources familiar with Chinese leadership strategy.

Online sources say we have 1,800 "deployed" and 2,800 "retired" and 4,000 "stockpiles" ....whatever that really means - probably scattered in pieces and can't be used without years of work, but we really don't know.
